content:
T.P.(C) NO. 2401 OF 2024
IN THE SUPREME COURT OF INDIA
 CIVIL ORIGINAL JURISDICTION   
TRANSFER PETITION (CIVIL) NO.   2401   OF 2024  
KANIKA DHINGRA                                     Petitioner(s)
                                VERSUS
NIKHIL DHINGRA                                     Respondent(s)
O R D E R 
1.The petitioner-wife has filed the petition under Section 25 of
the Code of Civil Procedure, 1908 before this Court seeking
transfer of petition bearing HMA/1269/023 titled as “Nikhil Dhingra
vs. Kanika Dhingra” pending before the Family Court, Agra (Uttar
Pradesh) to the Court of Principal Judge, Family Court, West
District, Tis Hazari Courts, Delhi. 
2.Despite due service of notice, no one has entered appearance
on behalf of the sole respondent. 
3.Having heard learned counsel for the petitioner and taking
into consideration the grounds taken in the transfer petition, we
allow the transfer petition and direct the transfer of case bearing
HMA/1269/023 titled as “Nikhil Dhingra vs. Kanika Dhingra” pending
before the Family Court, Agra (Uttar Pradesh) to the Court of
1T.P.(C) NO. 2401 OF 2024
Principal Judge, Family Court, West District, Tis Hazari Courts,
Delhi. 
4.Let the record of the case be transferred without delay.
5.A copy of this order be sent to the concerned court for
compliance. 
6.If  video  conferencing  facility  is  available  with  the
transferee Court, the benefit of the same shall be extended to the
parties.
7.Pending application(s), if any, shall stand disposed of.
    …………………………………………………………………………J.
    [PAMIDIGHANTAM SRI NARASIMHA ]
…………………………………………………………………………J.
[R. MAHADEVAN]
NEW DELHI;
  July 03, 2025
2T.P.(C) NO. 2401 OF 2024
ITEM NO.3               COURT NO.12               SECTION XI
               S U P R E M E  C O U R T  O F  I N D I A
                       RECORD OF PROCEEDINGS
Transfer Petition(s)(Civil)  No(s).  2401/2024
KANIKA DHINGRA                                     Petitioner(s)
                                VERSUS
NIKHIL DHINGRA                                     Respondent(s)
 
Date : 03-07-2025 This petition was called on for hearing today.
CORAM :  HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE PAMIDIGHANTAM SRI NARASIMHA
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE R. MAHADEVAN
(PARTIAL COURT WORKING DAYS BENCH)
For Petitioner(s) :Mr. Radha Krishnan, AOR
                   Ms. Sharmistha Choudhary, Adv.
                                      
For Respondent(s) : 
          UPON hearing the counsel the Court made the following
                             O R D E R
1.The Transfer Petition is allowed in terms of Signed Order.
2.Pending application(s), if any, shall stand disposed of.
(KAPIL TANDON)                                  (NIDHI WASON)
COURT MASTER (SH)                             COURT MASTER (NSH)
(Signed Order is placed on the file)
3
